title: Cookie Policy
welcome: This Cookie Policy explains how zykr App uses cookies and similar technologies to improve your experience.

section1.heading: 1. What Are Cookies?
section1.text: Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit a website or use an app. They help us remember your preferences and improve functionality.

section2.heading: 2. How We Use Cookies
items: To remember your language and sound settings.
To track your tasbeeh progress and user preferences.
To improve app performance and user experience.
To analyze app usage and community activity.

section3.heading: 3. Types of Cookies We Use
items: Essential Cookies: Required for basic app functionality.
Performance Cookies: Help us understand how users interact with the app.
Preference Cookies: Store your settings like language and theme.

section4.heading: 4. Managing Cookies
section4.text: You can control or delete cookies through your browser settings. However, disabling cookies may affect some features of the zykr App.

section5.heading: 5. Changes to This Policy
section5.text: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page.
